import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import blogpost from '../../../data/blog.json'; import { getBlog, getAuthor, getCategories, getTags, postnavigation } from '../../../helper/bloghelper'; import Sidebar from '../../layouts/Blogsidebar'; class Content extends Component { render() { const blogId = this.props.blogId; const item = getBlog(blogId); return (
{/* Blog Loop Start */}
